Title: The Point
Writer: Owen Coughlan (story), Joshua Dorsey, Alyssa Kuzmarov (story), Melissa Malkin (story)
Actors: Jonny Wagge, Sabrina Law, Julie Chauvin, Ruth Dolores
Plot: The Point is the name commonly given to one of Montreal's poorest neighbourhoods, Point St. Charles. In this film, the stories of 35 kids from the Point, gathered at scripting workshops, ...
